Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI

Class CharacterCardSelection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.CharacterCardSelection
public class CharacterCardSelection extends Object
The CharacterCardSelection class memorizes selection for the activation of a Character Card.
